metadata.title: CVE-2018-13066 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: There is a memory leak in util/parser.c in libming 0.4.8, which will leadto a denial of service via parseSWF_DEFINEBUTTON2, parseSWF_DEFINEFONT,parseSWF_DEFINEFONTINFO, parseSWF_DEFINELOSSLESS, parseSWF_DEFINESPRITE,parseSWF_DEFINETEXT, parseSWF_DOACTION, parseSWF_FILLSTYLEARRAY,parseSWF_FRAMELABEL, parseSWF_LINESTYLEARRAY, parseSWF_PLACEOBJECT2, orparseSWF_SHAPEWITHSTYLE.

criterions.comment: ming package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
